definition: not liable to taxation (of monastery, imperial family etc)/tax free/duty free (shop)
to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited

sentences.english: He bought her a gift at the duty-free shop.
sentences.chinese: 他在免税商店里给她买了份礼物。

sentences.english: Which things are duty-free when passing through the Customs?
sentences.chinese: 哪些东西通过海关时免税？

sentences.english: This TV set is not duty-free.
How many tax-free cigarettes and wines can I take if I travel to UK?3.
sentences.chinese: 叨教可以免税携带多少香烟和酒？

sentences.english: I paid $320 at the duty-free shop.
sentences.chinese: 我在免税商店付了320美元。

sentences.english: Did you buy anything in the duty-free stores?
sentences.chinese: 您有在免税店买什么东西么？

sentences.english: Maybe it is because that boasting is tax-free that they dare to boast more and more.
sentences.chinese: 也许因为吹牛是免税的，他们才敢大吹特吹。

sentences.english: Donation of HK$100 or above is tax-deductible.
sentences.chinese: 捐款港币一百元或以上可获免税。

sentences.english: how cellphones are bought tax-free on something casually called the “gray market.
sentences.chinese: 如何在所谓的“灰色市场”买到免税的进口手机。

sentences.english: It provides duty-free and quota-free treatment for certain clothing and other products.
sentences.chinese: 它提供了特定服装和其它产品免税免配额待遇。

sentences.english: This is my dear wife going into the duty-free shop at Gatwick Airport.
sentences.chinese: 这是我亲爱的夫人进入了盖特威克机场免税商店。

sentences.english: Where were they; dawdling in the duty-free at Bangkok airport?
sentences.chinese: 丢在哪里了呢，要不它们在泰国机场免税店里闲逛吧？

sentences.english: Are there duty-free shop in the immigration gate?
sentences.chinese: 出境口有没有免税商店？

sentences.english: In the case of local purchases of equipment and supplies, governments shall provide assurance of tax-free procurement.
sentences.chinese: 如果在当地采购设备和供应品，政府应保证免税采购。

sentences.english: Several-hundred activists took part, demanding an end to tax havens for the rich.
sentences.chinese: 游行得人们要求结束为富人设定的减免税政策。

definition: to reduce or waive (taxes, punishment, rent, tuition etc)
